text: “Udzawaona (osalungama) akusonyezedwa ku Moto ali okhumata chifukwa chakunyozeka uku akuyang’ana (Moto) mkayang’anidwe kobisa (kotsinzina). Ndipo amene adakhulupirira adzanena pa tsiku la Qiyâma: “Ndithu otaika ndi amene adadzitaya okha pamodzi ndi maanja awo.” Dziwani kuti osalungama adzakhala mchilango chamuyaya
